fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE OF
Nguyen Ngoc Quoc Son 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
  Date of Birth :   15 September 1991
  Address  :          25 Tran Van Danh, Phuong 13, Quan Tan Binh,Ho Chi Minh
  Mobile :             0376586716
  Emai l:               nguyensonrc@gmail.com
EDUCATION
   2009-2014 Da Lat University -  Majors Information Technology
QUALIFICATIONS
   Information Technology Engineers
LANGUAGE 
   English: Ordinary Level General English 
SKILLS
●
HTML, CSS, JavaCript, Boostrap, CSS3, PHP (a little), Xamarin form, 
Android(Strong), React Native (Strong)
●
System Analysis and Design
●
Database management system (MSSQL, Sqlite, Oracle)
●
Team work
●
Communication and interpersonal skills 
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
●Dec 2017 – Feb 2019 : Mobile Team Leader(React Native), MarryBaby, app 
development 1000NgayVang. 1000NgayVang app will receive updates on 
pregnancy, conception, your baby’s development, mums life, health, expert 
tips, helpful articles and the latest parenting news.
●Jan 2017 – Dec 2017 : Developer Mobile (React Native), Landsoft Company, 
app development Real Estale & Social Network  called Vime, includes two 
different applications interacting with each other (Vime CRM and Vime 
Vendor) chat with other condo residents, send notifcation, research common 
charges.
●Jan 2016 - Dec 2016: Developer Mobile (Android), Vu Thao Computer,  app 
development Housekeeping Service called Okiaf, includes two different 
applications interacting with each other (Okiaf for customer and Okiaf for 
provider) choose and book housekeeping services quickly.
●Dec 2014 – Dec 2015 : Developer Website , Mobile World Group – 
HoChiMinh City, development of websites and software used within the 
company
●Aug 2014 - Oct 2014: Asiantech Company, Da Nang - Participate in group 
projects about Filemaker (a database management system similar Access) 
Then moved to work on group projects applications for mobile (Android)
●Jan 2014 - May 2014: Fresher, FPT Software Company, Da Nang -Trained 
process of outsourcing in 4 months include strengthening and raising the 
level of C#,Asp.net, SQL, code convention. Besides, I also trained more 
about web programming in Java (Struts).
PROJECTS
●List of Automation (Java Web, Fsoft)
●Automatic Electric Cars (App C#, Fsoft)
●Filemaker (Asiantech Company)
●Happycall System (C# Web, Mobile World Group)
●Message & Notify System (C# Web, Mobile World Group)
●CRM applications for mobile ( Mobile World Group)
●Apps mobile on Android and React Native such as Vime, Okiaf, 
1000ngayvang
CAREER OBJECTIVE
      I would like to have a stable job and improve my expertise. In addition, I love 
to be involved in a dynamic professional working environment boasting a good 
team spirit. Hopefully my job will generate numerous opportunities and adequate 
payment in accordance with my compentence and attempt.
     I love mobile development job. Hence, with that passion, I would like to be 
employed as a fulltime developer for your company and my ultimate goal is to 
become the leader in the next 1 years and the head of this department in the next 5 
years.
PERSONAL PROFILE
     Enthusiastic, open minded, caring and resourceful. I'm optimistic, have a good  
sense of humour and get on easily with people of all ages and backgrounds.
INTERESTS
      Sports(Foolball,Basketball), youtuber , music.
